name: The Fight
description:
"The Fight" is a game of dissecting past conflicts to salvage a troubled relationship. You play one member of the fighting couple, granted the chance to revisit previous moments in the relationship. Using your knowledge from past instances of the fight, you may gain the power to save the relationship, or you may sink it for good.

This version of the game features original art and music. An earlier, text-only preview of the game is available here: https://bikeandbug.itch.io/the-fight-prototype
